Text: Just wanted to say thanks for the upload. I'll end up buying the game once it's out of beta thanks to you :). And happy holidays as well.

This game is as much trash, as Dwarf Fortress. If you're nto going to make a game easy enough to see through to bottom layers of caverns then, don't bother selling it.

No wonder the price is so low, it was made half assed, as a money sceme. I seriously am grateful that I tried it on pirate bay, first. Piece-of-shit, hands down.
